chapter: Factors influencing health status and contact with health services
block: Persons encountering health services for examination and investigation
category: Medical observation and evaluation for suspected diseases and conditions, ruled out
title: Observation for suspected mental and behavioural disorders
inclusion: persons who present some symptoms or evidence of an abnormal condition which requires study, but who, after examination and observation, show no need for further treatment or medical care
Observation for: dissocial behaviour without manifest psychiatric disorder
Observation for: fire-setting without manifest psychiatric disorder
Observation for: gang activity without manifest psychiatric disorder
Observation for: shop lifting without manifest psychiatric disorder
exclusion: examinations related to pregnancy and reproduction
person with feared complaint in whom no diagnosis is made
